message: Hello Bob, I am offering you my unique product for $125. This is a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a reasonable price. I believe it's a fair deal considering the worth of the product to both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $125 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I would like to propose an adjusted price of $115 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, $115 is still a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $110. If you're not able to accept that, I'll have to consider buying from John instead.
